restarter.partial_crash_warn: Due to a partial crash, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: Due to a partial crash, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: Ten serwer ma zaplanowany restart w ciągu %{smart_count} minuty. Proszę opuścić serwer. |||| Ten serwer ma zaplanowany restart w ciągu %{smart_count} minut.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** ma zaplanowany restart w ciągu %{smart_count} minuty. |||| **%{servername}** ma zaplanowany restart w ciągu %{smart_count} minut.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: OSTRZEŻENIE
nui_warning.instruction: Przytrzymaj [SPACJA] przez 10 sekund, aby odrzucić tę wiadomość.
